description:
Looks like something I could use, but trying to add new palettes and colors never quite works. It wont accept hex or RGB values entered, and I have to resort to manually dragging jittery sliders into place.

Backing out to the master list of palettes reverts any color changes I've made to whatever default color values that populate the new list.

Overall, this app is unusable.
Not possible to add a color with pre-defined RGB values, sliders is the only way to go. This defeats the purpose of storing palettes

Many buttons just don't work. It has a lot of bugs. A few basic things would make it a little better, like the ablity to switch themes and being able to work with rgb and hsl. But overall it's heading in a good direction.
summary: Good, but it has many bugs

description: When removing colors, I find that my renamed colors, become unnamed, among other bugs.
summary: Alpha quality software, in this state is almost unusable!

description: Nice app, great idea but impossible to manage a color palette since it is extremely buggy.

The idea itself is excellent, for example, you can group color polytres, you can select the colors themselves from the screen with an eyedropper, a minimalistic interface that is clear to everyone. But the application crashes too often, everything even comes to the point that I cannot use it for more than 2 minutes.
summary: The idea is good, but the implementation is bad
